comment: Steeped grains in 1 gallon of hot water from tap. (water hit about 165 at first but by 20 minutes it was down to 150 so called it good)  Didn't add any water for boil.  Cooled in sink with running water.  Added cold water from Brita pitcher to get back to 1 gallon.  Hops were 13.6% AA.  Used White Labs Belgian Golden Ale Yeast  WLP570.
